Non-linear


-   Non-linear content offers user interactivity to control progress
- Few types of non-linear content 
	- [[hypertext|nibm.dse.ics.hypertext]]
	- [[hypermedia|nibm.dse.ics.hypermedia]]


-   Examples

    -   Video games

    -   A movie in Netflix

    -   A Wikipedia article

    -   A dictionary
